release_notes.en-US: Just a very minor bug fix for a breaking change in Thunderbird7 (displayName was changed to name in the attachments object).

description.en-US: I stopped really working on this addon about 9 years ago - the last release was 7 years ago. It's discontinued. I'm not planning to fix the add-on to make it work on modern versions of Thunderbird - I'm surprised it worked at all for many years. It's open source - fork it and fix it if you want. The successor addon can be found at: https://addons.thunderbird.net/thunderbird/addon/attachmentextractor-continued/ old description Extracts all attachments from selected messages and then can delete, detach or mark-read. 1.3.5.1 Has now been set as compatible with Thunderbird 8 on AMO so your Thunderbird should silently re-enable AttachmentExtractor if you have TB8 installed. Warning! 1.3.5.1 doesn't really fully work with Thunderbird 5-8 - there are a number of errors thrown and its probable that some functions won't work but there was a large demand for an update and this was the quickest solution. I've rewritten large parts of the code in 1.4 but there are some features missing so its not been released yet. Its available as a beta in the Development Channel below if you want to give it a try. As your preferences are migrated in 1.4 you will loose them if you decide to go back to an older version afterwards. Just select the messages containing the attachments you want to extract and select 'Extract Attachments' and this extension does the rest. No more having to go through each message to extract the attachments! Check out the settings dialog for the different options.
description.de: Das Add-on hat einen Nachfolger erhalten, der mit Thunderbird 60 und neuer kompatibel ist: https://addons.thunderbird.net/thunderbird/addon/attachmentextractor-continued/

summary.en-US:
**This add-on doesn't work at all on new (60+) versions of Thunderbird.**

It's not worked fully for many years and development has long ago stopped on it. But there is a successor "AttachmentExtractor Continued" (URL see below).
summary.de:
** Dieses Add-On funktioniert in Thunderbird 60 und neuer nicht mehr! **

Die Entwicklung wurde bereits seit 2011 eingestellt. Es gibt aber einen Nachfolger "AttachmentExtractor Continued" (Link siehe unten)
